services.name: Presidents Week Special — 15% Off
services.description: Celebrate Presidents Week with 15% off all spa services! Facials, massages, body treatments, lash services, and more. Excludes nail services.
services.fullDescription:
Treat yourself to luxury this Presidents Week with 15% off our full range of spa services!

**Services Included:**
• All Facial Treatments (Hydra Facial, Signature Facials, Deep Cleansing, etc.)
• Massage Services (Swedish, Deep Tissue, Hot Stone, etc.)
• Body Treatments (Scrubs, Wraps, etc.)
• Lash Services (Lifts, Tints, Extensions)
• Brow Services (Shaping, Tinting, Lamination)
• Waxing Services (Full Body)
• Specialized Skin Treatments

**What's Excluded:**
• Nail services (manicures, pedicures, nail enhancements)

**Perfect For:**
• Self-care during your time off
• Midwinter skin rejuvenation
• Relaxation and stress relief
• Trying new treatments at a discount
• Gift yourself some pampering

**How to Book:**
1. Book online or call (718) 841-9919
2. Mention "Presidents Week Special" when booking
3. Discount automatically applied at checkout
4. Advance booking recommended for best availability

**Promotion Details:**
• Valid: February 15-23, 2026 (Presidents Week)
• 15% discount applied to all qualifying services
• Cannot be combined with other offers
• Excludes nail services only
• Book in advance for preferred time slots
benefits: Valid on facials, massages & body treatments
